snippet.title: Nobody Wants to Die - Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description: Lose yourself in the dystopian world of New York in the year 2329 in Nobody Wants to Die, a new detective noir adventure where immortality comes at a price that someone has to pay. As Detective James Karra, you'll lead the investigation using advanced technology, risking it all in pursuit of a serial killer targeting the city’s elite. Nobody Wants to Die is Coming to PC, Xbox Series X|S, and PlayStation 5 in 2024.
